Articles.Content:
Hello guys! New to the forums, but quite old in the game, playing it since 0.21.

The Voyager B-16 A2 0.23

This is my first craft to be shared with other people, and I hope this craft will be

be good to you and not be too hard to fly... HEHE

Well, don't just depend on the description, it's not really a spaceplane.

When there's no IntakeAir and you have to switch the Rapier Engine to ClosedCycle,

the engine will just suck the fuel as fast as a blackhole like about less than 1 minute.

But here it is. Hope you enjoy it!

This is a modded craft. It uses SpacePlanePlus.

Mod made by PorkJet.

Please notify me if there's some mod missing on the craft. I think I added some AIES parts...

Craft Description

"The Voyager B-16 is a fully functional, reusable spaceplane. reaching up to speeds

of more than 225m\s at sea level (lower than 1000m), it proves most reliable on most

atmospheric or suborbital flights.

This model is A2, which is an USSP (Ultrasonic SpacePlane), with a crew module,

capable for boarding 4 kerbals to either be transported to another area,

or to take notes while observing Kerbin's Land Topography.

-SAFETY TIPS-

Do not pull down hard. Craft may destabilize.

Land only with velocity more than 50m\s and below

70 m\s heading 15 to 20 degrees up."

Download Link

Edited June 16, 2014 by Eoal123
Woah. Just send me the craft file, i'll make it media fire. That is ONE BIG POST. Please, just let me do it!

Uh.... Not sure why you posted the crafts cfg file but ok....

I think you meant to post the .craft file which you would have to use a file sharing site for, like dropbox.

And post a pic of it, that will help.
I'd suggest just using mediafire to share the craft file, and including some pictures. Imgur will give you an easy bbcode link for forums. This thread is pretty awkward to read as is.

Srry. Internet was slow and lazy. I was about to include the mod at the download link. But when I login or register, I doesn't load.

But I'll add some pics right away.

Woah. Just send me the craft file, i'll make it media fire. That is ONE BIG POST. Please, just let me do it!

Uhhh... that's the craft file. Just Follow the instructions. Pls?
I got some probs with the pics. Can I choose from my comp?
Put that thing in a spoiler. That wall of text is a mile long. Either that or properly upload the file itself instead of opening it and pasting the contents on to the forum.

Put that thing in a spoiler. That wall of text is a mile long. Either that or properly upload the file itself instead of opening it and pasting the contents on to the forum.

Haha... I don't know hot to make spoilers. I'm just new
Clearly you don't understand the way to upload .craft files is to put the file on dropbox or mediafire and provide a link to it too. You just don't do it the way you did it here.

Clearly you don't understand the way to upload .craft files is to put the file on dropbox or mediafire and provide a link to it too. You just don't do it the way you did it here.

Nononono... I know how to upload but not making spoilers.

(SPOILER: NAME)stuffstuffstuff(/SPOILER)

Replace () with []

Alternatively, you could use (CODE)stuffstuffstuff(/CODE)

Or just upload the .craft...

(SPOILER: NAME)stuffstuffstuff(/SPOILER)

Replace () with []

Alternatively, you could use (CODE)stuffstuffstuff(/CODE)

Or just upload the .craft...

How about posting pics from computers?

I got some probs with the pics. Can I choose from my comp?

Can't post pics straight from your computer.

Try Imgur or some other picture sharing site.
